articles.description: Southside Flyers were challenged early but overran the Townsville Fire to win the WNBL grand final on Sunday.
articles.content:
I hadnt even thought about signing yet, I just wanted that moment again with Jenna. Shes one of the best leaders and an all-round great athlete and Im just so happy I got to do it again with her.
Fo… [+3304 chars]

articles.title: ‘One of the toughest puzzles’: UFC star silences doubters in first fight since breaking both hands - Fox Sports
articles.description: Former two-time welterweight title challenger Stephen ‘Wonderboy’ Thompson has outclassed Geoff Neal to end the latter’s seven-fight winning streak in the final UFC event of 2020.
articles.content:
Thompson won via unanimous decision (50-45, 50-45, 50-45) as the 38-year old proved he was still one of the worlds best welterweight fighters.
Wonderboy is still here, that title is going to be mine… [+3803 chars]

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Bayern Munich stars support Sane after being subbed on and off in Leverkusen win - Goal.com
articles.description: Manchester City will be looking at the likes of Erling Haaland and Lionel Messi to add “X-factor” to their squad, says Claus Lundekvam, with a former Norway international of the opinion that a fellow countryman is what the Blues need in upcoming windows.
